name: Oathbound

skills.name: Shatter
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK] [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Subjugate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Each hit has a 30% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 30%. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Intimidate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks at random 4 times. Each attack has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Cooldown Skills] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.

seo.description: Oathbound is a epic def champion from the faction Banner-Lords doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
